general: I’d like to introduce my friend.
What do you do for a living?
What do you do for fun?
languages: Could you please speak a little slower?
shopping: Can I pay by credit card/debit card?
Do you have this in small?
transportation: How much for a first class ticket to?
What time does the bus from arrive?
What time does the bus to depart?
Do I have to change buses?
Do I need a seat reservation?
Could you call me a taxi?
Could you let me know when to get off?
Where could I rent a bike?
I’d like to rent a bike
eating & drinking: Could you recommend a good restaurant?
What is the special of the day?
Could I see the menu, please?
Could I get the bill, please
Can I buy you a drink?
directions: Where is the closest bank office?
Where can I find tourist information?
Can you show me that on the map?
sightseeing: What’s on at the theatre tonight?
What is there to see around here?
accomodations: Do you have any single rooms available?
I’d like to stay for nights.
The TV in my room doesn’t work.
Could I get a different room?
